title: Fusion Food Airpot Flask – 3L Double Wall Insulated Thermal Coffee Carafe with Pump Action & 360° Rotating Base – Stainless Steel Hot Water Dispenser for Tea, Coffee & Cold Drinks
features: Available in Multiple Sizes & Elegant Colours : Choose the perfect thermal airpot flask to suit your needs with 2L, 3L, and 5L capacities. Whether you're serving tea, coffee, or cold beverages, this hot drink dispenser is available in sleek silver and classic black finishes, making it a stylish addition to kitchens, offices, cafes, and outdoor events.

Superior Heat & Cold Retention for Hours : Designed with a double-wall stainless steel vacuum insulation, this hot water flask keeps drinks piping hot or refreshingly cold for extended periods. Perfect for meetings, catering, home use, or travel, it ensures your drinks maintain the ideal temperature while minimizing heat loss.

Effortless & Spill-Free Dispensing : The pump flask features a push-button dispensing system that allows smooth pouring with minimal effort. Simply press the lever to dispense hot water, tea, or coffee without spills or mess, making it an efficient and hassle-free option for offices, events, and gatherings.

Premium Stainless Steel Build with Stylish Finish : Made from brushed stainless steel with a durable black trim, this thermal flask for hot and cold drinks combines modern aesthetics with long-lasting durability. Its anti-spill design ensures a mess-free experience, while the 360° rotating base makes serving effortless.

Portable, Convenient & Easy to Use : Designed with a sturdy carry handle and removable ABS lever lid, this hot drink flask is easy to transport and store. Whether you're indoors or outdoors, at a picnic, party, or corporate event, this hot water dispenser is an essential addition to your beverage service setup.
